tool_description: Validates hardware compatibility with target operating system versions and provides recommendations for supported OS editions and potential compatibility issues.

target_os.description: Target operating system: Windows 10, Windows 11, Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 22.04, macOS Monterey, macOS Ventura

hardware_profile.description: Hardware profile data from hardware scanner

check_tpm.description: Whether to check TPM requirements for Windows 11

check_secure_boot.description: Whether to verify secure boot compatibility

error_messages: Unsupported OS version: Use one of the supported operating system versions.
Invalid hardware profile: Provide valid hardware profile data from System Hardware Scanner.
TPM check failed: Unable to detect TPM module status.
Secure boot verification failed: Cannot determine secure boot capability.
usage: Provide target_os and hardware_profile from previous hardware scan. Enable TPM and secure boot checks for modern OS installations. Review compatibility_issues for any blocking problems.

supported_editions.description: List of supported OS editions for the hardware

compatibility_issues.description: List of potential compatibility problems and warnings

recommended_edition.description: Recommended OS edition based on hardware capabilities
